overview: "25 Weeks: A Wisconsin Harvest" is the story of the 2020 wheat harvest on Anarchy Acres, a tiny farm in Wisconsin.  This unusual farm is working hard to re-create the wheat of 19th century Wisconsin by growing out rare wheat cultivars from samples held in seed banks.  Anarchy Acres uses a team of miniature donkeys for some field work, and pays close attention to sustainable farming practices.  Food, the environment, and mutual respect are lived out in a millennia-old cycle.
title: 25 Weeks: A Wisconsin Pizza Harvest
